heisigStory: Pluralizing the snake and focusing on a single taskmaster may help recommend the image of Ireland's most famous reformer, St. Patrick, who, legend has it, drove away the snakes from the land.
hint: Pluralizing the snake and focusing on a single taskmaster may help recommend the image of Ireland´s most famous reformer, St. Patrick, who, legend has it, drove away the snakes from the land.
koohiiStory1: The taskmaster of Slytherin ( wizardry house symbolized by a snake ) plans a reformation of Hogwarts, disallowing the study of magic to all muggle-born. こわいですね！.
koohiiStory2: This is a Meiji reformation taskmaster, trying to force usage of the Roman alphabet in Japan in place of Kanji. He holds a snake in the shape of the letter S and tries to explain how much simpler this is (j/k).
